name: Cake Ninja 2
description:
Cake Ninja 2 is the sequel to the very popular casual game, Cake Ninja, which was among the TOP 20 of the best-selling Nintendo DSiWare games in North America. Slide the stylus across the screen to slice cakes into small pieces like a true Ninja warrior.

Key Features:

- Simple, addictive gameplay

- Colourful 3D graphics

- Precise slice recognition

- 8 challenging game modes

- A collection of bonuses

- Unlockable achievements

- Post your results online and have a chance to earn 100,000 Nintendo DSi Points in the contest
